d:
Wait... What's this? It's a surprise public story! You see, since I was aware that, due to how I handled the release of the final story of "The Heroines," I realized there wouldn't be a public story this month, I decided to do this quick and simple story with one of the characters from one of the artists I most admire and respect. The story is a spin-off from my succubus world where we'll see a variant of Shiroi, the main character from Darkflame's "The Monochromes" series. Without further ado, I hope you enjoy it!

Remember that if you want to see the stories a month before publication and without censorship, you can support me on one of these platforms:
FANBOX: https://gabriellm180.fanbox.cc/
PATREON: https://www.patreon.com/gabrielLM180
SUSCRIBESTAR: https://subscribestar.adult/gabriellm180

If you have an idea to offer or want to talk about the stories, there is also a discord for you to do so!
DISCORD: https://discord.gg/Adnq97sGtz
